properties.description: Detects permanent failover of a cloud replica initiated by a tenant. This might indicate disaster recovery activity or issues with primary systems.
properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 27000
| extend VmRef = extract("VmRef=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend TenantID = extract("TenantID=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend TenantID = extract("TenantID=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend HostID = extract("HostID=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    ["Replica Name"] = VmRef,
    ["Tenant ID"] = TenantID,
    ["Data SourceID"] = HostID,
    MessageDetails = Description,
    Severity = SeverityDescription
properties.name: Cloud Replica Permanent Failover Performed by Tenant
